PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_EvaporativeCoolerTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Evaporative cooler type common attributes.\X\0D Sound attribute deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcSoundProperties instead. WaterRequirement attribute unit type modified in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

PropertyDef.Name: AirPressureDropCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Air pressure drop as function of air flow rate.

PropertyDef.Name: EffectivenessTable
PropertyDef.Definition: Total heat transfer effectiveness curve as a function of the primary air flow rate.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowArrangement
PropertyDef.Definition: CounterFlow: Air and water flow enter in different directions.\X\0D \X\0D CrossFlow: Air and water flow are perpendicular.\X\0D ParallelFlow: Air and water flow enter in same directions.

PropertyDef.Name: OperationTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable operation ambient air temperature range.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1').

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: WaterPressDropCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Water pressure drop as function of water flow rate.
